ProteinName	Probable RNA-binding protein 46 (Cancer/testis antigen 68) (CT68) (RNA-binding motif protein 46)
GeneName	RBM46
Length	485
Function	Essential for male and female fertility, playing a crucial role in regulating germ cell development by ensuring the proper progression of meiosis prophase I (By similarity). Regulates mitotic-to-meiotic transition in spermatogenesis by forming a complex with MEIOC and YTHDC2 which recognizes and down-regulates mitotic transcripts for a successful meiotic entry (By similarity). Required for normal synaptonemal complex formation during meiosis, binding meiotic cohesin subunit mRNAs containing GCCUAU/GUUCGA motifs in their 3'UTRs regions and positively regulating their translation (By similarity). Required for spermatogonial differentiation in both developing and adult testis (By similarity).
